statements: SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, timestamp FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, DATE(timestamp) AS interaction_date FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Like' AND user_id = 3 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, item_id, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE location LIKE '%York%' ORDER BY last_interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE item_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, COUNT(item_id) as total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 50
SELECT user_id, gender, location, MAX(age) as max_age FROM user_profiles WHERE age IS NOT NULL GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_age DESC
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, COUNT(interaction_type) as interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id, interaction_type
SELECT user_id, MAX(interaction_timestamp) as last_interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY last_interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, gender FROM users WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 40;
SELECT interactions.interaction_id, users.username, interactions.interaction_type, interactions.interaction_date FROM interactions JOIN users ON interactions.user_id = users.user_id;

SELECT users.username, interactions.interaction_type, products.product_name FROM users JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id JOIN products ON products.product_id = interactions.interaction_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, interactions.interaction_type FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT item_name, category FROM items WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, item_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT item_name, category FROM items WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing') AND item_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY item_name ASC;

SELECT u.username, r.recommendation_score, i.item_name FROM users u JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN items i ON r.item_id = i.item_id WHERE r.recommendation_score > 0.5 ORDER BY r.recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM Items WHERE price < 100;
SELECT user_id, item_id, rating FROM Ratings WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT user_id, item_id, confidence FROM Recommendations ORDER BY confidence DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, gender FROM Users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM Items WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, item_id, rating FROM Ratings WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT user_id, item_id, confidence FROM Recommendations WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY user_id ASC, confidence DESC;
